Title: Makes certain state lands in the county of Oswego subject to taxation for all purposes
Summary: Makes certain state lands in the towns of Albion, Amboy, Boylston, Constantia, Parish, West Monroe and Williamstown, in the county of Oswego, subject to taxation for all purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to certain state lands in the county of Oswego which shall be subject to taxation
